name: Microsoft Edge Style Menu For Firefox | 仿Edge菜单
description:
Make your menu look like edge on Windows 10/11

This style is for FIREFOX 90+ only.

Please copy the css to userChrome.css
请把 CSS 复制到 userChrome.css 中
Please uncomment all css, some syntaxes are not supported by userstyles.org.
请取消所有 css 注释，有的语法 userstyles.org 不支持
additional_info:
Thing you should know:
  1. You must enable userChrome.css support and copy the css to userChrome.css
  2. tested on Windows 11(Locale zh_cn) via Firefox 101 (worked flawlessly,almost every FF version change some code that breaks some things of this style,if happens,you can email me)
  3. I seldom use Chrome.
  4. a comment? YES. Just be objetive, not subjetive.
Update notes:
  1. Remake for firefox 101
  2. 2015.03.11 Change diabled menus background to transparent and fix font color for lastpast menus
  3. 2015.08.08 Fix a problem
  4. 2015.12.31 Fix a bug(always resetting width)
  5. 2015.12.25 Adjust Lastpass menuitem text color when mouse hover
  6. 2015.12.23 Adapted to checkboxs and radios and add some options
  7. 2015.12.19 Fix userChrome Mix popupmenu Alignment and BMB popupmenus styles
  8. 2015.12.16 Fix some bugs.
  9. 2015.12.14 First Release.

discussions.name: Works great, except for one minor thing
